project_descr: Sustainable Public Transport and Sport, a 2010 Opportunity

outputs.output_descr: The Sustainable Transport and Sport Project aims to mitigate greenhouse gas emissions through the promotion of sustainable urban passenger transportation in the venue cities of the 2010 FIFA World Cup. The project will also contribute to climate stabilization by reducing or avoiding CO2 emissions in the order of 423,000 tonnes of CO2 (over a 10-year period). The indirect CO2 emission reduction due to replication is an estimated 2 million tCO2 -equivalent over a ten year period.
